movie.title: Malcolm X
movie.plot: A tribute to the controversial black activist and leader of the struggle for black liberation. He hit bottom during his imprisonment in the '50s, he became a Black Muslim and then a leader in the Nation of Islam. His assassination in 1965 left a legacy of self-determination and racial pride.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 22 nominations.
